body:
So I love having all of the features of these mods, but they keep crashing. A pop up appears saying "Java(TM) Platform SE Binary has stopped working". I have already deleted everything of those two mods, everything from the Launcher, its folder in .minecraft and even the versions of them in the .minecraft

For Laby v2.7.7 1.8.8 I use 
Optifine HD_D_U_G7 1.8.8
Toggle Sneak v5 1.8.8

and For 5zig v3.5.2 for 1.8.9
Optifine HD_D_U_H3 1.8.9

Help anyone?
body_tagged:
So I love having all of the features of these mods, but they keep crashing. A pop up appears saying "Java(TM) Platform SE Binary has stopped working". I have already deleted everything of those two mods, everything from the Launcher, its folder in .minecraft and even the versions of them in the .minecraft

For Laby v2.7.7 1.8.8 I use 
Optifine HD_D_U_G7 1.8.8
Toggle Sneak v5 1.8.8

and For 5zig v3.5.2 for 1.8.9
Optifine HD_D_U_H3 1.8.9

Help anyone?

replies.body:
One is for 1.8.8, another - for 1.8.9. Maybe they are in conflict. 
You can delete Minecraft and install it again (dont forget to save your saves)
To update java go to java.com and download the last version.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body_tagged: well i played on mac and this never happened to me before so i have no idea what is wrong

replies.body:
Select your mod profile.
Click "Edit profile"
Go to Java Settings (advanced)
Click executable, tick it
The line of text should look like this: C:\Program Files\Java\jre(insert number here)\bin\javaw.exe
CHANGE the number after jre to 7

Now try, this worked for me, may work for you :)

replies.body:
Recreate it (install optifine, 5zig and labymod, like you did in the first place), let the game crash.
Now go to ".minecraft\crash-reports", open the latest file (it should be a text file) and copy the whole content.
After you copied it go to pastebin.com and paste it (and click save).
Since you done all above, copy the pastebin link and post it here.
